```{r load configuration}
cfg_file <- pkgload::package_file('inst', 'default_config.yml')
cfg <- reactive({
  req(cfg_file)
  read_config(cfg_file)
})
acc <- reactive({
  generate_calendar(cfg = cfg())
})
```
